title: Kasselakis to Mitsotakis about Tempi: “Is it true that the state can’t verify what number of are useless?” (Video) – 2024-06-06 20:27:31
text:
His sturdy response SYRIZA attributable to what Kostas Lakafosis revealed to MEGA, concerning the crime of Tempi forward of the trial for the case.
The professional famous that “the state has not mapped the crime scene”:
“The error that the state has made is that it has not recorded what was discovered and the place, from injured and victims and to attract a conclusion about what might have occurred to every of the 57. Even when it was 57 or not it has not reply the state or state company. There was no report of the place as a result of there was an inexplicable rush to “gather” every little thing. The court docket should someway know the place the individuals have been on the time they have been killed.”
“Look individuals within the eye and reply” “Mr. Prime Minister, it isn’t humorous. It is a crime. Look individuals within the eye and reply” says o Stefanos Kasselakis and addresses key inquiries to Kyriakos Mitsotakis:
“I’m asking the Prime Minister to reply: Is it true that the state can’t even verify the variety of useless within the Tempe crime?
Why this inexplicable rush, Mr. Prime Minister, to gather every little thing piecemeal, with none report?
Did you or did you not give an order to edit the conversations of the railwaymen on the identical evening of the accident, in order that the edited materials could possibly be given to Maximus’s favourite web site, First Matter?
Did you or did you not give an order to your right-hand man, the deputy minister subsequent to the Prime Minister, Mr. Triandopoulos, two days after the crime, to arrange a gathering that remained secret and has now been revealed, throughout which it was determined to kill the Tempes?”
The announcement of SYRIZA:
“Greek society continues to observe in shock the just about each day revelations concerning the well-planned cover-up operation of the crime in Tempe.
The professional professional, Kostas Lakafosis, revealed that “the state has not completed mapping of the crime scene”, with a view to reply the kin what occurred to every of the 57 useless in Tempe. One thing that the specialists undertook to cowl up the legal indifference of the authorities.
“Even when he was 57 or not, the state or state company has no reply. There was no report of the place as a result of there was an inexplicable rush to “gather” every little thing. […] Most died immediately or nearly immediately, had no hope of survival and weren’t tortured – as one may think. Nonetheless, there are some, 5.6 individuals, who would have survived if there had been no fireplace and explosion”, the chilling report of Mr. Lakafosis (Mega, 5.6.24).
A lawyer for kin of the victims, he spoke of an unprecedented and legal alteration of the crime scene below investigation “from which proof was eliminated, whereas the physiognomy of the bottom was additionally altered, with the recognized switch of virtually a constructing block” (Mega, 5.6.24).
And he reiterated that the explosion was attributable to flammable materials, the existence of which is causally linked to the demise of some individuals, who weren’t killed by the collision as such, however burned alive.
“There was an allalum within the coordination and both it is because of excessive negligence and excessive stupidity or it is because of one thing that’s coordinated, so it’s suspicious,” underlined the lawyer. He estimated that the “undressing of the system” will outcome from the continuing investigation and the trial course of.
If he has an iota of empathy left, even now, Mr. Mitsotakis should converse with braveness and honesty about what occurred within the first hours and days after the crime of Tempe and take the obligations that belong to the federal government and people in hiding, now and former, his ministers.
He owes it to the households of the victims, but additionally to all Greek women and men, to place a cease to the cover-up operation and to permit the ministers to be tried earlier than common justice.”
